branchCategory.name: AC20A-B to AC60A-B, Filter Regulator and Lubricator
branchCategory.description: SMC'S new AC-B series of modular type F.R.L. unit is available in six basic sizes and is interchangeable with the existing modular AC line. The AC-B series has a maximum set pressure of 125 psi and offers embedded gauge and pressure switch options not found in the AC-A. The element and bowl on the AF series is now one-piece, making element replacement easier. Required maintenance space has been reduced by as much as 46% on the AFseries, depending on the body size. Bowls on size 30 and up are now covered with a transparent bowl guard, completely protecting them from the enviromnent, and making the interior contents visible from 360 degrees. The base color of the new AC-B is uban white, maintaining a clean, modern look.
branchCategory.bullets: <UL> <LI>Filter, regulator, and lubricator unit <LI>Clean looking, modular design <LI>One-piece element and bowl for easy replacement (AW) <LI>Transparent bowl guard for 360 degree visibility <LI>Embedded gauge and pressure switch options available <LI>Rc(PT), G(PF) or NPT threads</LI></UL>
